goal.ch: Through the discussion of related topics in the energy field, students could understand: (1) the importance, related issues and analysis theory on balanced development of energy, environment and economic growth. (2) analysis and forecast of international oil price changes; (3) specific quantification methods of environmental costs; (4) policy evaluations and recommendations of Taiwan‘s energy policy (including climate change response, energy transition policy, oil and electricity price policy, etc.)
